reviews.review:
I f*cking hate this game. It is the bane of my life that made me suffer in a total of 11.2 hours, everyone I knew died from the digital hands of this game. 
DO NOT PLAY THIS GAME


Рекомендую

1) The game is too cumbersome when it comes to the movement of the character and objects. 
2) I got stuck later on in the game because of the unclear and out of place introduction of the "Barnacle", which all of a sudden forced you to use a "grappling hook" of sorts to simply move forward with the game. Not only it doesn't impact the combat gameplay in a positive way, but it breaks the game flow. It's  just a gimmick.
3) The AI of your companions is horrendous, they shoot you more than the enemy.
4) You can change the difficulty of the game during the campaign only through the console. 

There's much better first person shooters that I've played that I recommend instead: Duke 3D, Shadow Warrior Classic Redux, Brutal Doom mod with Doom 1 and 2 WADs, Arcane Dimensions quake mod, Brutal Doom 64 mod for Doom 2.
Neglected middle child of the HL1 story. Great mechanics.

Half Life was an awesome game all the way back in 1998. This game was such an improvement over the original game. Newer, good looking weapons, a different side to the madness & just all around fun. I would suggest this to anyone who likes shooters

Opposing Force is one of the greatest spin-offs of a major title I've experienced to this day. One of my favorite things to do in a video game is play the antagonist, experience the not-so-heroic side of things. This game nails that perfectly. From killing civilians to chasing Gordon Freeman ever-so closely makes this game an incredibly different experience that we've come to enjoy and know from Half-Life.

Another great element was the huge amount of new weapons and enemies that aren't seen in Half-Life. It gives this game it's own personality and really makes it stand out among the other games in the franchise. So many unique elements in this game, things completely exclusive to this game.

One of my least favorite things from Half-Life and Blue Shift were the Xen levels, however. But here, Opposing force did that well, too. You go to Xen for possibly a grand total of 5 minutes in this 6 hour game. It's not that I don't like Xen, it's just the level design in those parts consistently tended to fall apart in those segments.

This game also greatly encourages working with your squad. Whenever they present to you a fellow soldier in the game, shortly after, there will be a series of hostiles that you could take by yourself, but would prove to be a bit tough, even with all the weapons the game gives you, but would prove an absolute cake walk with a team. Which is great, because, this way, you don't feel like an all-powerful God that nothing can stop, instead you just feel like a guy... with bottomless pockets to fit 20 guns.

My only gripe is that at times the level design was a bit questionable. The path forward wasn't always that obvious, and sometimes kind of, well, dumb. It's not often that I feel this, and it's never that bad, it's just... odd at times.

Overall, I give Half-Life: Opposing Force:

9.2 Weaponized Barnacles out of 10

Yeah, the weaponized barnacles might have been one of my favorite weapons. If only we got it sooner in the game, and was given more freedom with it. Fingers crossed Crowbar Collective makes a remake of this game on the same caliber as Black Mesa.
Old but gold and I love the 90's feels on this game.
Impressive for it's time!
Excellent, even in 2020 it keeps its magic.

its a really good expansion pack to the original half life 9/10 there are still some bugs as expected since its an old game but one time my save file got corupted when i saved mmy game in the sewers part

很棒的DLC，主角阵营颠倒，变成了一名目标是杀死戈登的军人，但意外发生只能尽力逃亡。首先训练关卡就有很大改变，变成军营里训练的场景了。本作队友的种类明显变多了，医疗兵可以救自己也可以救队友，工程兵可以切开锁死的门，电台还能用来推动剧情。武器种类大大增加了，光近战武器就有三种全新的，扳手蓄力攻击很好用，吸人的海葵很好玩，大机枪、狙击枪非常猛，再加上有时候身边跟着的三四个队友，总有种在玩CS的感觉。玩法上增加了荡绳子（如果发现绳子没有摆动的物理特效的bug，在控制台把fps_override改回0），弱鸡小手电变成了夜视仪（虽然会亮瞎狗眼），怪物种类也有所增加。虽然这个DLC是外包给Gearbox制作的，但是质量出乎意料的高，如果玩完本体还意犹未尽，一定要试试。

It's also fairly cheap, at the time of buying it's only $5 which is also great. It's the first Half Life game I've played since I didn't have enough for the first Half Life but it's still awesome. Play it if you want a fun FPS with some horror, or if you have some cash burning into your pocket and maybe wanna try the Half Life series.

Half-life Opposing Force è il migliore pacchetto espansione creato per la serie di Half-life!
Graficamente il gioco è come Half-Life, ma livello di gameplay e tutt'altra cosa....hai nuove armi e nuove abilità, come ad esempio puoi arrampicarti sulle corde per arrivare in altri luoghi, coontattare altri marin con le radio, hai nuove armi come una chiave inglese a pappagallo, un coltello, una desert eagle con puntatore laser, un fucile da cecchino, una potentissima mitragliatrice che è talmente potente che quando spari l'arma ti buttera all'indietro e nuove armi organiche come uno di qui tentacoli che Gordon incontra molto frequentemente in Black mesa o un lanciarazzi di spore e così via ,ma sopratutto nuovi nemici come ray-x  che sono dei nuovi tipi di alieni e i soldati  black ops che sono stati inviati per piazzare una bomba per distruggere Black mesa questi sono ostili con chiunque, questo comprende anche le assassine che abbiamo tutti incontrato in Half-Life.
vi dico solo una cosa a volte potete vedere certe sequenze che abbiamo visto in Half-Life come quel marin che dalla trasmissione radio in "tensioni in superficie" oppure vedere Gordon Freeman in persona saltare nel potale per Xen e adoro l'attenzione per i dettagli!
in questo Half-Life vestirai i panni del caporale Adrian Shephard uno dai marin!
ah piccolo appunto Steam dice che il gioco non mai è stato doppiato in italiano ma in realtà lo è solo che valve non ha inserito la cartella con l'audio italiano nonostante tutto nell' internet troverete di sicuro la cartella con l'audio italiano! =)

This was a great addition to the original Half Life. It honestly felt like it's own game most of the time, and at times I enjoyed it more than the original Half-Life. The atmosphere definitely isn't as scary, and it's sometimes annoying  trying to get your squad to follow you, but if you liked Half Life, then this is definitely worth getting. New weapons, new bosses, an actual story (unlike blue shift). I would love to see a remake.

I mean it has new npcs both friendly and also hostile I mean s**t theres new unique aliens called race X and they expanded black ops and gave it more lore about what the hell they were doing in black mesa incident and of course they expanded the H.E.C.U faction adding classes like medic and engineer.

 It has new weapons that Gordon Freeman and Barney Calhoun (*cough *cough Half Life Blue shift) didnt get such as 357 desert eagle, m40 sniper rifle, displacer...etc, more story about later stages of Black Mesa incident......and well........ more everything

 Is it worth the money ? F**K YEAH, its my favorite expansion pack and my favorite Half Life game. Now Im gonna wait for Operation: Black Mesa. (If it ever comes out).

I must start this review off by saying I am not a huge fan of Half Life despite playing 1, 2 as well as Blue Shift and Episode One & Episode Two of Half-Life 2. I found Half-Life 1 to be mostly good, Blue Shift was forgettable, Half-Life 2 and Episode One were mediocre, and Episode Two was actually quite good. But I found them to be a bit uninspired mostly. So when I played Opposing Force I went in thinking that it would also feel pretty meh but I was quite pleasantly surprised about how good Opposing Force actually is. So this time Development duties were handed off to Gearbox, yes the same Gearbox who would later make Borderlands, While Valve was involved in the creation of this game, they took a backseat overseeing role as they were busy with other projects at the time. So with that out of the way, let's look into what makes this game fantastic, and see if there are any flaws to be found


Pros:

1. The Story is very interesting, you play as Cpl. Adrian Sheppard of the United States Marines, he is on the mission to eliminate all Black Mesa Personel to cover up the Black Mesa incident, however upon arrival your helicopter is shot down and you're taken into Black Mesa, and things continue from there.

2. The level design is really good here as it's a nice blend of horror, puzzle solving and combat, it's also paced rather well which is appreciated.

3. There are a lot of new enemies featured here such as some new aliens as well as a Male black ops varient of the assassin enemy which are as deadly as the female counterparts from the first game. This adds some variety to what you will encounter in the game which is nice.

4. Sheppard is equipped with Night Vision instead of a Flash 

4. There are also many new weapons such as a Sniper Rifle, a Light Machine Gun, A Desert Eagle, A Wrench, A Combat Knife, The Displacer Cannon (Bootleg BFG), A shock roach, The Spore Launcher and the Barnacle Arm alongside the returning Spas 12, Tripmines, Grenades, MP5 and 9MM Pistol. These new weapons breathe new life into the game and really are fun to use, it makes the game feel fresh, and as an added Bonus: The Magnum and Crossbow appear in the game's Multiplayer.

5. Speaking of Which: Multiplayer is back and is great once again, you have the traditional deathmatch which is fun and you also have a CTF (Capture The Flag) which is nice, and there are some fun new maps.

6. The game is also paced really  well which is nice as I feel Half-Life 1 dragged on for a bit too long and got slow at times, thankfully this doesn't have this issue.

7. G-Man makes an appearence in this game and that alone is a plus, because G-Man is awesome.

8. The game ends with a pretty epic boss fight, although the boss is easy once you figure it out, but still it's great that sheppard got to finish off with a boss, unlike Barney who got a bunch of mere grunts.




So that's it for positives, you may be wondering is there any negatives? well there is maybe 1 or 2, so let's take a gander



Cons:


1. The Enemies still rely on Hitscan here instead of projectiles which once again can lead to you getting drained easily if you aren't being careful, which just sucks honestly as you'd think an issue like that shouldn't exist. I get that Hitscan at the time is common and even nowadays still is, but like I always say if it's well implemented like in Doom then it isn't a problem at all, in Half-Life though it just is badly implemented and at times feels unfair.


2. Some sections of the game can be insanely brutal making it hard to pass by with any HP left which can lead you to getting shredded on the next one. This normally isn't an issue if one plays with quick saves but for someone like me who doesn't, you may be in for some bumpy rides. 


But yeah other than those 2 small blemishes, this game is honestly oustanding and easily the best Half-Life game of them all. You should absolutely give this game a try, even if you're only slightly interested in Half-Life, I would recommend giving this game a look as it's just fantastic, absolutely seek this out and play it if you are a Half-Life fan or want to play all the games.


Half-Life Opposing Force is a well done expansion and earns a 9/10
мне понравилось всё спасибо за все half life что есть спасибо за продолжения half life, но есть минус вы выпустили half life alyx вместо half life 3, но я знаю что будет half life 3

Как дополнение – почти идеальная игра с несущественными минусами. Много нового и интересного, инцидент в комплексе показан совсем с другой точки зрения. Старались всего ничего, а много достигли! В отличие от следующего дополнения.

Огромное количество оружия, нет даже лишнего, как и новые монстры, тоже интересные и своеобразные. Локации все же оставляют желать лучшего, почти все как в оригинале.

Игра порадовала головоломками и загадками, их здесь больше, чем в других играх серии. И еще они намного интереснее, потому что связаны с наукой, в основном с физикой.

А как интересно проходить новую тренировку в качестве морпеха! Это и увлекательно и реалистично и затягивающе. Лазания по канату, медики и инженеры, с ними военные выглядят заправскими профессионалами.

Длительность игры в два раза ниже, чем у оригинала. Тут колебания. Лучше это, или хуже? Наверно все-таки лучше, потому что мне кажется, разработчики не смогли бы сохранить оригинальность долгое время.

Играйте в этот шедевр! Не надо брезговать устаревшей графикой!

Half-Life: Opposing Force is a good game, not amazing, but worth it. It is the best game in the GoldSrc trilogy of Half-Life games. It offers new weapons and a fun tutorial, better voice acting and more puzzles, while it is more difficult than HL1 or Blue Shift, it is a very fun game and deserves its own rightful spot in great half-life games. It also introduces new enemies and movement mechanics, and even the displacer cannon, which allows you to travel between Xen and Earth willingly. It has its flaws, such as some enemies being to hard for a area spars with health kits or ammo, also the A.I. in friendly soldiers is not great, but that is to be expected for 1999, even if characters like the engineer die, you cant progress.
This is just as fun as the original Half-Life. Highly, HIGHLY recommend.
Интересная игра, фанам Халвы советую

Такой же half life, но только с любимыми HECU и меньшим количеством головоломок, но это не мешает насладится игрой. 
Игра стоит своих денег. Правда глав поменьше, но это вам не 239 р за основную игру. Локации не схожи с ХЛ (не считая каньонов), экшена поменьше, да и боссов легко пройти. За то есть мультиплеер. Opposing forces is one of those games where despite being the child of its parent game, it spectacularly holds well on its own. I love all the new weapons it comes with, the new systems it introduces, and even with its small a.i. faults, the squad system is quite enjoyable to work around with. I'd recommend this after completing HL1 and Blue shift though, for obvious reasons involving both story and quality.
